divs: Sighting DetailsDriving south on i95 on way home from work in traffic when I noticed one then 6 more very far away like maybe above the Bronx . This was so weird and scary that I called my wife and asked her to turn on news that we may be being bombed. Multiple cars pulled over to look and it appeared over 30 car witnessed same event that lasted about 15 min
Summary: 7 smoke like meteors dark black with black trail coming down like missiles
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Stamford
There were no other sightings in Stamford on or around October 29th 2013
